Name: Falls and Fortune
Title: Falls and Fortune
Desc: The accident of falling into a pit can also be a chance to reveal the buried past beneath the dust.

Talent.Name: Falls and Fortune
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when you have at least 8 Elemental Dice remaining and your opponent has not ended their Round:</color> In this Round, both sides must spend 1 extra Elemental Die when switching characters.
